channel.title: public policy on Owen F. Davis
channel.description: Recent content in public policy on Owen F. Davis

item.title: Older Workers and Employer-Sponsored Health Insurance Premiums: Evidence From Linked Administrative and Survey Data
item.description: This study explores the relationship between employer age structure and health insurance premiums using administrative data.

item.title: How Does the Earned Income Tax Credit Work? Exploring the Role of Commuting and Personal Transportation
item.description: This paper uses a simulated instrument approach to explore the personal transportation and commuting mechanism behind the Earned Income Tax Credit.

item.title: Retirement Reforms Are Necessaryâ€”So Is Strengthening Social Security
item.description: In light of growing calls for retirement system reform, this report assesses the economic effects of Social Security.
